duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the company's OneLogin Expert, interfacing with internal DevOps and Development teams.
Support and develop client integrations using OneLogin Trusted IDP.
Assist internal development teams with implementing and supporting API/SAML connections to custom developed applications.
Implement and manage application certificates, user security policies, and permissions for site users and ensure compliance with user/site security best practices.
Maintain the firm’s Splunk Cloud and on-premises platform and create connections from internal SQL database to feed data into Splunk.
Design and build analytic and data security reporting/dashboarding using Splunk to provide insight into application usage, system health, and security.
Assist the SharePoint support team with ad-hoc administration tasks when needed and act as LDAPCP SharePoint Subject Matter Expert for client extranets.
Support the architecture for the firm’s SharePoint extranets and intranet in partnership with the SharePoint support team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
